data.name: Repin Develop Casual
data.detailed_description:
Repin Develop Casual is a gaming platform that includes many games, the number of which is only increasing. Play premium and mini-games of various genres! Get achievements, compete with friends or complete levels in cooperative mode on splitscreen. From racing to shooters, 2d and 3d. All this is designed and optimized for a huge number of devices and operating systems Linux, Android, Windows.
In addition to mini-games, demo versions of future new premium games will be available to you for free!
Thanks to the integration with the Steam service, you will have the opportunity to use the Remote Play Together function and play cooperative and competitive games online!
All this is available to you absolutely for free!

data.short_description: Repin Develop Casual is a gaming platform that includes many games, the number of which is only increasing. Play premium and mini-games of various genres! Get achievements, compete with friends in a joint game on the splitscreen. From racing to shooters, 2d and 3d...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4200M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4200M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In some games there may be violence, blood and foul language!
